com.smartthings.sdk.client.methods

Interface AppsApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiClient.Api

    public interface AppsApi
extends ApiClient.Api

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AppsApi.ListAppsQueryParams
      A convenience class for generating query parameters for the listApps method in a fluent style.

    • Method Detail

      • createApp

        CreateAppResponse createApp(java.lang.String authorization,
                            CreateOrUpdateAppRequest createOrUpdateAppRequest)
        Create an app. Create an app integration. A single developer account is allowed to contain a maximum of 500 apps. Upon hitting that limit a 422 error response is returned with an error code of LimitError.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        createOrUpdateAppRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        CreateAppResponse

      • deleteApp

        DeleteAppResponse deleteApp(java.lang.String authorization,
                            java.lang.String appNameOrId)
        Delete an app. Delete an app.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        appNameOrId - The appName or appId field of an app. (required)
        Returns:
        DeleteAppResponse

      • generateAppOauth

        GenerateAppOAuthResponse generateAppOauth(java.lang.String authorization,
                                          java.lang.String appNameOrId,
                                          GenerateAppOAuthRequest generateAppOAuthRequest)
        Generate an app's oauth client/secret. When an app is first created an OAuth client/secret are automatically generated for the integration. However, there are times when it maybe useful to re-generate a client/secret. Such as in cases where a secret becomes compromised.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        appNameOrId - The appName or appId field of an app. (required)
        generateAppOAuthRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        GenerateAppOAuthResponse

      • getApp

        App getApp(java.lang.String authorization,
           java.lang.String appNameOrId)
        Get an app. Get a single app.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        appNameOrId - The appName or appId field of an app. (required)
        Returns:
        App

        Returns:

                                      java.lang.String appNameOrId)

        appNameOrId - The appName or appId field of an app. (required)
        Returns:
        GetAppSettingsResponse

      • listApps

        PagedApps listApps(java.lang.String authorization,
                   java.lang.String appType)
        List apps. List all apps configured in an account.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        appType - The App Type of the application. (required)
        Returns:
        PagedApps

      • listApps

        PagedApps listApps(java.lang.String authorization,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParams)
        List apps. List all apps configured in an account. Note, this is equivalent to the other listApps method, but with the query parameters collected into a single Map parameter. This is convenient for services with optional query parameters, especially when used with the AppsApi.ListAppsQueryParams class that allows for building up this map in a fluent style.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        queryParams - Map of query parameters as name-value pairs

        The following elements may be specified in the query map:

        • appType - The App Type of the application. (required)
        Returns:
        PagedApps
